Projects

P is for Projects. Here’s a few things I’ve worked on in the past few years. This isn’t a complete portfolio.

Also check out my developer profiles on GitHub and Glitch.

  • game-of-life

    A JavaScript implementation of Conway's Game of Life, using Uint32Arrays to make sure it runs lightning-fast.

    JavaScriptGitHub •
  • Lambda

    Bringing complex numbers, matrices, and more to JavaScript, in pursuit of making a fully-fledged calculator.

    JavaScriptGitHub •
  • d-flat

    Have you ever wondered what the derivative of a song would sound like?

    JavaScriptGitHub • View live on Glitch •
  • yt-for-me

    Steals videos from YouTube, how fun! One of my larger projects.

    JavaScriptGitHub • View live
  • Haruka

    A useless Discord bot, one of my larger projects.

    CoffeeScriptGitHub •
  • A text based game

    A port of a text-based game written in Python by a friend.

    CoffeeScriptView live on Glitch •
